name: LarryChapelRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: larry chapel radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hope for Convicts and Opioid Addicts is devoted to helping inmates use their time wisely in prison and to prepare to lead a drug free and crime free life upon release. The radio program will systematically help inmates and those addicted identify, analyze and then annihilate the hindrances to a spirit-filled life. Please ask those you know who are in prison or addicted to listen. Download and listen to episodes for free at letmyprisonersgo.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
